title: Border country
creator_credit: Peter Thompson, Jill Robb, South Australian Film Corporation and Trojan Films
brief_description: A cinematic exploration of South Eastern South Australia, a region that combines the wild beauty of The Coorong with lush grazing properties, pine forests, Mt Gambier’s famous Blue Lake, and the quiet charm of small fishing villages.
creator_credit_for_label: Peter Thompson, Jill Robb, South Australian Film Corporation and Trojan Films
